Package com.github.dandelion.core.asset

Interface Summary
AssetsLoader Public Api to define a Loader for Asset
AssetsLocationWrapper Wrapper for one or many locations associate with a location key
 

Class Summary
Asset Definition of an Asset Name of asset (aka Key) Version of asset Type of asset Possibles locations of assets like : Remote access (aka CDN, Static Content Server, Any url) Local access (Classpath)
AssetParameters Bean to store parameters/values for an usage when the assets are rendered.
Assets Assets API
AssetsCache Cache System for store specific content of an asset
AssetsComponent Definition of a set of asset link to Scope/Parent Scope
AssetsConfigurator Load Assets configuration assetsLoader : the AssetsLoader found in 'dandelion/dandelion.properties' for key 'assetsLoader' or AssetsJsonLoader by default assets.locations : type of access to assets content(remote [by default], local) Default Asset Loader is
AssetsRequestContext Request Context to stock all needed assets by scopes during page processing
AssetsStorage Tree Storage Units for Assets

An asset is store by his scope.
All scopes have a parent except for ROOT parent (aka Root Scope).
An asset can be access by his scope.
 

Enum Summary
AssetsStorageError Possible Errors for 'Assets Storage'
AssetType Possible type of asset
